divs: Sighting Detailsi spotted red light while sitting in my back yard.i knew right away it was unusual.i watched it for a few minutes then ran inside to tell my mother to come out and see it.she said she did't know what it could be.the weather was chilly so she went back inside.i stayed and watched it for for another 15 minutes.the light was perfectly stationary except for the last 3 or 4 seconds when it started blinking and dropped down a little and then disappeared.the light was fairly high in altitude because a patch of mid-level clouds passed in front of it for a couple of minutes. i looked at it through my binoculars but could'nt see any details .about an hour later i saw the same or a similar light in the same spot.it was not moving.i watched it for approx.30 seconds and ran back inside to get my binoculars again.when i went back outside the light was gone.i called a local tv station to report what i had seen.i was told that they had received other calls about the red light.
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were no other sightings in Austin on or around November 7th 1997
Summary: stationary red light approx. 35 degrees above eastern horizon
